reviews.text: We initially planned 2 nights here but as the place was so nice we decided an extra night was needed. The location is perfect - central but quiet, only a few minutes walk to shops, restaurants and the Thermal Pools. We had a one bedroom apartment and it was very spacious - a TV and DVD player in in the lounge and another TV in the bedroom. Free hire of DVD's made our little boy very happy! The extra little touches really do make this place a treat - the cakes put in our room after housekeeping were a lovely and a nice surprise. Our only crticism was the lack of a bath, most families with a small children need this extra bonus.
reviews.title: stayed an extra night it was so nice!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Warm comfortable room with excellent views (upstairs). The service is friendly and helpful and it was the little touches that set it apart from similarly priced accommodation. Location is excellent; close to shops and the pool complex. Hanmer Springs is a lovely place for a relaxing few days — we'll be back!
reviews.title: Excellent experience

reviews.text: A really nice, quiet , central spot from which to enjoty Hamner Springs. Unit very well equipped and owners helpful and friendly - particularly appreciated the very comfortable beds, electric blanket, heat pump and home baking.
reviews.title: We're coming back

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Anne and Merv were very welcoming and nothing wa too much trouble for them.
reviews.title: Home away from Home

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed for 6 night and each day were presented with beautiful, tasty home made muffins, cake or scones.
reviews.title: Fantastic accommodation in beautiful location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Even though this older style motel has had a makeover, to some extent it still shows it's age. The room was comfortable & clean, the hosts friendly, & several extras such a $2 towel hire v $5 at Hanmer Springs Spa Centre, and a great choice of free DVD's were nice touches. You cannot however go past the fact that our room like most of the rooms had a great view of the carpark!!. Summing up, convenient, clean & comfortable budget accommodation.
reviews.title: Convenient & comfortable motel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Owners are quite rude to us. Dont think they appreciate young couples. They also dont like it if you pointed out a fault. Service is just average. Its probably the cheapest motels around though. Sorry, would not come back again.
reviews.title: BAD customer service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed just the 1 night and had room 10 up the back. Good size bed with all the essentials. Nice to see 3 (rather than 2) of crockery and utensils etc. Nice balcony sitting facing the golf course and surprise outdoor seating at the back facing the mountains. A quick 10second walk at the back takes you onto a grassed hill which reminds of sound of music setting (for the oldies). Quiet location but suspect true for nearly all accommodation.
reviews.title: Sound of Music View

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We recently stayed here at the Aspen Lodge and were totaly impressed with our visit.
reviews.title: Everything You Want In A Motel

reviews.text: The owners were happy to pick us up and drop us off at the local aerodrome free of charge, the rooms were absolutely immaculate and the Super King size bed went down well with someone who is 6'4".
reviews.title: -RIP OFF-

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The motel is located within easy walking distance from shops and restaurants and all in all, we couldnt fault the place. Will surely return if we are ever back in town.
reviews.title: Warm hospitality in a clean and homely setting.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed one night the rooms were okay (but not worth the price) but really hot and stuffy due to being mid summer. Not sure if any motels have AC around area. Our big problem was the RUDE as management.DONT STAY HERE if you want to feel welcome. Also our young daughter by accident put the Hand and body lotion in our toilet bag which when we arrived home they had charged us 30 dollars for. We sent it back but they only credited us 20 dollars and charged an admin fee of 10 dollars. Just Rude.
reviews.title: Relaxing, spacious friendly motel

reviews.text: On arrival we were warmly welcomed and shown to our room which was beautifully clean and cosy. This motel is conveniently located just a stones throw from the hot springs and town center. We felt relaxed immediately and made the most of their large DVD library (as well as the hot pools!). Our room was serviced immaculately and fresh muffins were left for us to enjoy on our return :) We were encouraged to help ourselves so fresh pool towels at no extra charge. No questions were asked when Ali set up his DJ gear in the room for a low key practice (big gig was looming in CHC that weekend!). Overall we were very impressed and felt completely at ease staying at Aspen Lodge. The room was spacious and included a flat screen tv, comfy couch, balcony, cooking facitlities and some lovely little extras :) Would also like to give mention to Saints restaurant where we returned twice during our stay! Yummy pizza and great coffee!
reviews.title: Great stay at Aspen
